about.title: About AL-Hidayyah
about.subtitle: Serving Humanity, Guided by Faith
about.description: AL-Hidayyah Islamic Foundation was established with a clear vision: to serve Allah by serving His creation. We believe that true success comes from combining faith with action, knowledge with compassion, and individual growth with community development.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be a leading Islamic organization that transforms lives through authentic Islamic education, compassionate orphan care, and community empowerment. We envision a world where every child has access to quality education, every orphan finds love and support, and every community benefits from authentic Islamic knowledge.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To serve Allah and humanity by:
points: Spreading authentic Islamic knowledge through comprehensive Dawah programs
Providing loving care, education, and support to orphaned children
Delivering quality Islamic education that combines academic excellence with faith
Building strong, compassionate communities based on Islamic values
Empowering individuals to become positive contributors to society
Following the Sunnah of the Prophet (peace be upon him) in all our endeavors

orphanage.description: The Prophet (peace be upon him) said: 'I and the caretaker of an orphan will be in Paradise like this' - and he held up his index and middle fingers together. Following this beautiful Sunnah, we provide comprehensive care for orphaned children.

school.title: Riyad Saliheen International School
school.subtitle: Excellence in Education, Rooted in Faith
school.description: Riyad Saliheen School provides a unique educational experience that combines academic excellence with Islamic values. Our comprehensive curriculum prepares students for success in this world while nurturing their faith and character for the Hereafter.

features.title: Academic Excellence
features.description: International curriculum with modern teaching methods, qualified teachers, and small class sizes for personalized attention

features.title: Islamic Education
features.description: Integrated Islamic studies including Quran memorization, Arabic language, Seerah, and Islamic jurisprudence

features.title: Character Building
features.description: Focus on developing moral values, good character (Akhlaq), and responsible citizenship based on Islamic principles

features.title: Modern Facilities
features.description: Well-equipped classrooms, science labs, library, computer labs, and sports facilities

features.title: Extracurricular Activities
features.description: Sports, arts, debate, Quran competitions, and various clubs to develop well-rounded individuals

features.title: Scholarship Programs
features.description: Financial assistance for deserving students to ensure education is accessible to all

school.impact: Preparing the next generation of Muslim leaders and scholars

testimonials.name: Amina Hassan
testimonials.content: Riyad Saliheen School has transformed my children. They not only excel academically but have also developed strong Islamic character. The teachers are dedicated and the environment is nurturing.

testimonials.name: Dr. Muhammad Ali
testimonials.content: The Dawah programs at AL-Hidayyah have been instrumental in strengthening our community's understanding of Islam. The scholars are knowledgeable and the programs are well-organized.

testimonials.name: Fatima Ibrahim
testimonials.content: I lost my parents at a young age, but AL-Hidayyah became my family. They provided me with education, love, and support. Today, I'm a university graduate, all thanks to their care.

testimonials.name: Umar Abdullah
testimonials.content: Volunteering with AL-Hidayyah has been one of the most rewarding experiences. Seeing the impact of our work on children and communities is truly inspiring.
